import React, {useReducer} from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardImg, Button} from 'reactstrap' const initialState = 0 const reducer = (state, action) => { switch (action){ case 'tambah': return state + 1 case 'kurang': return state - 1 default: return state } } function HookReducer () { const [count, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState) return(
